entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as leading Harry and Hermione through the forest. He is described as marching easily through thickets of thorn, while Harry and Hermione struggle to keep up.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as struggling to keep up with Hagrid in the forest. His arms and legs are covered in small cuts and scratches.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as struggling to keep up with Hagrid in the forest, along with Harry.

relationships.description: Hagrid leads Harry through the forest.
Hagrid also leads Hermione through the forest.
